mapper.select: SELECT sales_order.sale_id,seller_id,manager_id,customer_id,remarks,time,status,delivery_status,product_id,unit_price,num FROM xietong.sales_order,sales_product where sales_order.sale_id=sales_product.sale_id and sales_order.effective=1 and sales_product.effective=1

SELECT sales_order.sale_id,shipment.shipment_id,shipment.time,shipment.status,shipment_product.product_id,num FROM xietong.shipment,sales_order,shipment_product where shipment.sale_id=sales_order.sale_id and shipment.shipment_id=shipment_product.shipment_id and shipment.effective=1 and shipment_product.effective=1
mapper.update: update sales_order set status=#{status} where sale_id=#{saleId}
update sales_order set delivery_status=#{deliveryStatus} where sale_id=#{saleId}
update sales_order set effective=false where sale_id=#{saleId}
